cydarm_api_base_url.description: Base URL of Cydarm API.  Example: https://xyz.cydarm.io/cydarm-api
cydarm_api_base_url.name: cydarm_api_base_url

actions.description: Validate the Cydarm asset configuration by attempting to generate an Access Token
Get a Cydarm case by UUID
Query Cydarm cases with a keyword filter
Create a plaintext comment on an action instance

data.name: data
data.description: Comment to add to action instance

actions.verbose: Assumes a mimeType='text/plain' and a significance='Comment'.

actions.description: Create a plaintext comment on a case

acl.name: acl
acl.description: The ACL of the data object

assignee.name: assignee
assignee.description: The email address of the current assignee

closed.name: closed
closed.description: The time at which the case was closed. Expected format: ISO-8601

created.name: created
created.description: The time at which the case was created. Expected format: ISO-8601

deletable.name: deletable
deletable.description: Whether the data is deletable in the current context

editable.name: editable
editable.description: Whether the data is editable in the current context

manageable.name: manageable
manageable.description: Whether the data is manageable in the current context

members.name: members
members.description:
UUIDs of member cases (if this case is a group).
                           Expected format: JSON Array.
                           Example: ["d9e526e8-59fc-44e3-8458-08da3269e0b0", "bd10075d-740c-4a7c-931c-c2a65843f3dc"]

metadata.name: metadata

minSlaSeconds.name: minSlaSeconds
minSlaSeconds.description: The minimum SLA remaining time, in seconds

org.name: org
org.description: The name of the organisation who the case is relevant to

readable.name: readable
readable.description: Whether the data is readable in the current context

severityName.name: severityName
severityName.description: The severity name for the case

status.name: status
status.description: The current status of the case

tags.name: tags
tags.description: The tags attached to this case. Expected format: JSON Array

totalActionsInAllPlaybooks.name: totalActionsInAllPlaybooks
totalActionsInAllPlaybooks.description: The total number of actions for all playbooks in a case

totalCompletedActionsInAllPlaybooks.name: totalCompletedActionsInAllPlaybooks
totalCompletedActionsInAllPlaybooks.description: The number of actions that are completed for all playbooks in a case

updateAcls.description: Update all ACLS for the case including data items

status.description: Case's status. Currently only supports value of 'Event'
